pr_title: [Analytics] Update the plugin key for analytics to match one generated by the cli

timeline.message: Update the plugin key for analytics to match one generated by the cli and update configuration method
Update the plugin key for analytics to match one generated by the cli and update configuration method

timeline.bodyText: Will it still use the configuration in the test directory?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: Yep it does. We use context to context.getPackageName() which in case of tests returns com.amplifyframework.analytics.pinpoint.test as before.
replies.author: desokroshan
